plot: After waking up from a three-year coma, a man must seek revenge on the person who brutally murdered his friend.
title: The Alley
plot_es: After waking up from a three-year coma, a man must seek revenge on the person who brutally murdered his friend.
plot_en: After waking up from a three-year coma, a man must seek revenge on the person who brutally murdered his friend.
